website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option that offers comfort and style.
pros: Bikini sits at a low price point and fits true to size
Available in a range of patterns and solid colors
Holds up well when hand washed
Made from thick material that isn’t see-through
cons: Some think the bottoms do not provide enough coverage

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies. Do yourself a huge favor and buy this suit. For years I have struggled with my body and bikinis. I have never found a more flattering suit. For reference, my cup size is 36B, waist is 29inch and hips are 41inch. I typically wear size 8 in jeans/shorts. I bought a size large and since I’m so short (5’2) I think next time I’ll go with a medium because there’s a tiny bit of extra fabric BUT STILL oh my gosh guys, this suit is amazing. I want one in every color. For $20 are you kidding me? This suit is a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: LOVED THIS SUIT!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4. 34C cup size. 146 lbs. I ordered a size Medium and it was PERFECT!! Loved this suit because the bottoms covered up the belly pooch but still made it look fun and beachy! Loved the bottoms because they were a little bit cheeky and made me feel like a Caribbean beach babe on the trip! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Hochstetler

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!! Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Let me say I LOVE THIS SUIT! To be honest I figured the top would be too big and it is slightly but it works. The bottoms fit like a glove! I ordered a medium, I’m 140 lbs, 5’4” and 32A bust. I have thick thighs/big booty but very flat chested so I assumed the suit would fit a little odd considering how I’m proportioned but nope! I also normally wear size 8 pants and small or medium tops. There’s padding in the top which is nice. And the bottoms do kind of ride up, cheeky but super comfy and that’s what I was going for LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Leahhh

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this two piece! You never know with Amazon but I’m incredibly impressed with the quality of the suit. I’m about 140lbs, size 8 jeans, 5’5, around a 34d. I went with a large and found the bottoms to fit PERFECTLY, but the top a little large. Not by much, but enough to make it a bit uncomfortable. I contacted the seller and they offered to ship me a medium for free, no question. I’m very happy with my purchase and customer service. Can’t wait to wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: True to size, decent quality
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 4'', 145 lb, and 32ddd and got a medium. Bottoms fit well and are cheeky as described. Tbe top is to be expected for my busy size. It fits well around the body but the actual breast aren't fully covered, they either show a little out the top or bottom depending on how you place the top. Couldn't run in it, that's for sure but its cute and inexpensive!
customer_reviews.author: megman

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect rise on my hips and don't quite cover my ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this suit!! I'm 5'3" 124lbs 34C and a small fit perfectly! They are the perfect rise on my hips and don't quite cover my belly button which I really like. The bottoms are pretty cheeky (you can faintly see where my tan line is from other bottoms) but I don't mind them at all since the legs aren't tight and cut into my skin like other suits. Would recommend to anyone looking for a cute high waisted suit and will probably be ordering another in a different color
customer_reviews.author: Liza Overton

customer_reviews.title: Overall great suit for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is definitely worth the price! It’s not great quality (obviously) but it’ll definitely get the job done. I’m a 32b with a more athletic build and I got a size small (I normally wear small tops and small/medium bottoms) and it fits well! A tad big in the top but it stays up. The bottoms are definitely high waisted and flattering! The waist of them is a bit snug. The top has removable padding which is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Corriveau

customer_reviews.title: great suit for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit! I'm not crazy about high waisted suits but I'm glad I gave this one a try. It fits great - comes up higher at the sides but my belly button is still exposed. I may have to keep tugging at the bandeau top all day (haven't worn this yet but I know how these go!), but I don't even care. It's that good! For reference, I'm 5'7", 155 lbs, 38" chest, 27.5" waist, 40" hips. I ordered a Large in the Leopard print. I'm going to order more colors in this exact style so that I can mix & match. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: I really like this swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms are on the cheekier side but overall, I really like this swimsuit. As someone who has bought one swimsuit in their entire life, I was more than a little hesitant to buy one without trying it on but I'm glad that I did. I love the style of the top and the yellow color is a ton of fun. For reference, I am 5'3 and 120lbs and the small fit great. I was nervous about the bottoms because I usually wear a medium but this worked out just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Liesel

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit on my body
customer_reviews.text: **bikini on the right in the pic** So I first bought the Zaful brand thong version of this swimsuit (left pic) but the bottoms just aren’t for me, hence I found this one where the bottoms cover more The fit isn’t flattering for me. Maybe I’m just too chunky, idk. Also, the zaful top is a medium and fits better than this top, which is a small. I thought it’d be the same bikini but the pattern is bigger on this one and the fit is different. I wish I could have the zaful print (I like that it’s smaller), the top and a more flattering pair of bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sexy
customer_reviews.text: In white - medium, in black - large. I’m 5’8” 155 lbs. The large was just too big and the medium was a little snug but not too tight. I think for me personally a medium top with large bottoms would be perfect, but I’m inclined to believe that the medium just looks better on me (maybe it’s the pattern). Great quality and so soft! Definitely recommend, just may need to play with the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Cumberlands

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! I have never loved a swimsuit more. It’s extremely hard for me to find strapless swim suits that actually fit my chest but this one was perfect and supportive. For reference I’m 5’4” 178 lbs and a 36E in bras. I ordered the large and it was the perfect size. I normally wear a 8/10 in pants and dresses and a large in everything else.
customer_reviews.author: E_Hernandez97

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I booked a last minute vacation and needed a bathing suit on a whim. After shopping around on Amazon I decided to go with this style and I absolutely do not regret it. I was nervous it would either be too small or too large; However, it fit perfectly. I am 118Ib 5'2" and ordered a small. The material is soft & the padding in the top was a nice touch since many bathing suits in the tube top/bandeau style don't have any. I had to stop myself from coming on here and immediately buying two more as soon as I received mine. I will definitely be buying in more colors though in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The hype is real! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! This is the first high waisted swimsuit I've ever liked on me! - the leopard print is perfect - it's flattering - comfortable - fits great everywhere - top stays put - great quality Can't wait to wear it after the quarantine! I got a large. Bra size: 36C Waist: 30" Hips: 42.5" Weight: 156 lbs Height: 5'5"
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I actually love this suit! I ordered a small based off size suggestions from others.. I'm 5'3 about 120lbs with a little bit of a booty and wear a 34B/32C cup. The bottoms come up to a very flattering fit around the waistline, don't create any muffin top or cut into my sides and are high cut on the hip, very cheeky! Super sexy! Top fit just fine as well, comfortable snug fit, but not too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Walker

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms are flattering and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: 5'1" 165lbs 34D, ordered size large. Bottoms are perfect, high cut is really flattering on the lower belly and for thick hips/thighs even if you've lost some of your hourglass shape. The top is a really wide bandeau and kind of tight, I prefer a push up bandeau to the flattening one, but its still pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I’ve wanted a suit like this all summer and based on the decent reviews
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted a suit like this all summer and based on the decent reviews, I decided to take a gamble. I am 5’4 and an athletic 140lbs, 36C-D, so I went with a medium. After trying it on, I decided I might have been able to pull off a small, as the back on the bottoms is a bit loose/droopy and I foresee myself hiking up the top. Otherwise, The material is good quality and I like the dark wine color.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the cut of this suit, but was shocked at how big it was. My true size is a medium, but as many women know when it comes to sizing for bikinis they often run small - this is not the case for this swim suit. I originally ordered it in the large, thinking it would run small, and it was huge. I returned the large and ordered a medium, again, large in the chest area especially. I am 5’8 and have a 34D for chest size. I’m ordering a small now which is rare and hoping I can keep this one!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Arndt

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t make you look like a busted can of biscuits
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! I wish all swimsuit bottoms were made like this. You can kind of tell in the pictures that the edges of the swimsuit are sewn differently than you average swimsuit, and I was right!! I have that area where my hip bone is that all swimsuits seem to squeeze and make everything so unflattering. This was perfect and doesn’t squeeze too tight anywhere. I did think that it would be a little more high waisted in the tummy area since I have a little post-baby belly that is hard to control but I don’t even care though. This is the best swimsuit I’ve ever had, even pre-baby. And the hot pink one is amazing. Will be ordering more colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Gmdvs

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: One star for how soft it is. Otherwise terrible construction. Top is one tube, right? Well the fabric isn’t sewn so it stays in place. Like, an infinity scarf can wrinkle up and turn funny ways, same goes for this top. Plus it’s huge. Bottoms were cute but not flattering with nearly all of my rear end exposed. I ordered a medium per other reviews, I’d say size down if you’re on the fence - it will hang on you, dry. Who knows how it hold water and will droop in unwanted places.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Short, athletic girls, read this.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so not bad, BUT I am 5’2, 157 lbs. built more boxy and this did not work. I bought a large because I wear 38D, the top was cool- nothing special buuuutttt the bottoms.. yikes. They did not fit my short boxy body well. The suit was well-made, but the sizing was weird to me. I found the same style of suit (probably through another Chinese back alley shop) they fit my body MUCH better. Same style but just more accurate sizing I guess. My husband literally said to me, “whoa that makes your butt look weird.” And my butt is my best asset. If you’re tall, no matter the size of body, this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rey

customer_reviews.title: You'll be a total babe, BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6ft tall, 155lbs, 34DD and I ordered a meduim! I rarely find women my height/weight who leave reviews so I thought it was important because I LOVE this swimsuit. The white is not see through, which I was worried about and if you are on the fence about a size, size down! This suit is great for the price, I want more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made, high quality for great price!
customer_reviews.text: The suit was extremely well made. I normally fit into a size Medium perfectly, but I’m super busty up top and I would have been better off ordering a Large because it was a little too tight. I did love the suit though and it was super flattering, so I might order another color in the Large. I would have given this 5 stars, but I removed one only because you can’t mix and match sizes for tops and bottoms. Other than that, this suit is PERFECT. Absolutely recommend no matter what your body type, if you look through the review photos it’s flattering on literally everyone! Size up if you have a large chest.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not for a big booty gal!
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews, I took a chance on this fitting me. I typically wear a XL and size 16 bottoms. The top fit fine, (I’m a 38C) but the bottoms were way too tight to even get on. I would have ripped them if I pulled them up. If you’re smaller on the bottom these may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah & Jason

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and silky soft
customer_reviews.text: i ordered a medium (36c and size 4 in jeans) and it fit perfectly. super comfortable and soft material. i got a lot of compliments on it on vacation! the bottoms are a little cheeky but i wasn’t uncomfortable, plus i went on vacation with my family and they didn’t even notice or say anything (trust me they would have if they thought my butt was out too much). the top stayed on throughout all the swimming and didn’t slip down or anything. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie

customer_reviews.title: NEED SIZE X-SMALL FOR PETITE WOMEN
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4 and 118 lbs. Most small swim suits fit me fine but this one was too loose for my taste. I have a small booty and prefer my cheeks are exposed just a wee bit in my swim suit. I could tell if I got in the water with this suit it would be sagging from the water and that is not the look I'm going for. I didn't even bother trying on the top. I'm certain it would have been too big as well especially since I am a 32B. It is a very pretty color and the material is soft and well made but simply too big. An X-small would have been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Sizing funny UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: ****I actually ended up returning this, I loved it so much, but I couldn’t even breathe standing with this around my chest.*** I’ve been looking for a cheetah or leopard print bathing suit for awhile, and I had my heart set on loving this. Im a hair smaller than a size 12, small 36C, 5”4, thick but muscular all around.. purchased an XL. This suit is pretty tight on me, all around. Very high waisted, bum definitely hangs out. I’m really surprised this fits other people as well as it does..if you have bigger breasts than I do, you’re going to be suffocated. If you don’t mind that, I would say this is a great suit.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Cook

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again or recommend to a friend!! New favorite bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: I instantly fell in love with this suit when I tried it on. I was very nervous it wouldn't fit due to the other reviews but it fit just as expected. I normally wear a medium top and a large bottom but I followed the measurements and got a small like it said. I am 120 lbs, 5 ft 3 in, regular size chest, and large bottom. I don't like anything too cheeky but I didn't have a problem with these being a little cheeky. Would definitely recommend or buy in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well with curves
customer_reviews.text: My measurements are: 5’5” , 180lbs , 39” bust (36 D), 33” waist, 46” hips. I bought an XL. I’m bottom heavy and that’s usually my biggest problem with bikinis. It fits perfectly and doesn’t cut into me. The material is bathing suit material and lined throughout, it’s great in the water. There’s also removable pads in the top. The bottom is definitely cheeky so I don’t recommend if you’re not comfortable with that. Product is so good I’m going to purchase more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Damnit Keri

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’2” and 125lbs with a 32DDD chest and ordered a small based on other reviews. It was exactly as pictured, material was good, and it fit fine overall, but it just didn’t compliment my body. The bottoms were a bit more cheeky than I’d prefer and I probably needed a medium in the top, although it didn’t have the support I needed regardless of the size. I debated keeping it because it was so cute, but ended up returning because I didn’t feel comfortable with the fit. I think this could be the perfect suit for many people (those with smaller chests who don’t mind cheeky bottoms), but it was not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love fabric and print, didn’t love fit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this suit but returned it. The top was too small and the bottoms were a tad big in the booty. I thought I could make the top work but when I bent over and my ladies popped out I decided it needed to go back. It also squished all of my back fat together so it wasn’t flattering from behind. Snake print was really cute, fabric was nicer than I expected. Ordered a small. I’m 5’6, 127 lbs and 32DDD or 34DD, athletic. If I could mix and match the sizes I think I would love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cute bathing suit and good quality for the price. I am 5'6, 145lbs, have an athletic build and am small chested. I bought a small and medium just to be safe. The tops fit pretty similar for both sizes, but the bottoms on the medium were baggy in the back so I went with the small. Just be aware that the bottoms are very cheeky!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Scheele

customer_reviews.title: Flattering fit
customer_reviews.text: For those of you shopping for size I am 5’3” / 120lbs with a 32C/34B chest and an athletic build and I got a small. The top is tight and smooshes my girls a bit, but I don’t mind and would rather have it like this than falling down. The bottoms fit pretty perfectly, a little on the loose side. I have a bigger booty and the cut in the back is very flattering. It rides up high on my hips but then dips below my belly button. Very flattering and sexy. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nearlydawn

customer_reviews.title: Cheeky little thing!
customer_reviews.text: I am heavier than I’ve ever been (not counting pregnancy) but I said screw it, and bought this suit! Body confidence y’all! Lol It was worth it. I read a ton of reviews and appreciate all those who took pictures, and listed their actual size because those are the reviews that truly help; for reference, I am 5’6 and weigh 190lbs. I am a 38D up too, and hourglass shape. Not only did the top fit, (snug enough that I’m not worried about bending over and falling out!) but, the bottoms make my butt look GOOD! I’m convinced this swimsuit looks good on every body type. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: POPE FAMILY

customer_reviews.title: Gonna go viral someday
customer_reviews.text: And not in a good way. The top slips off A LOT, if you get in the water, slip, if you jump, slip, move too much, slip. I was left exposed in public WAY too many times. So embarrassing. I'm gonna need a refund or at least half since the bottom is snug and comfortable, I have no problem with, BUT THE TOP?! HECK NO!
customer_reviews.author: Foxi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice flattering suite
customer_reviews.text: Great swimming suit!! Nice quality, white top isn’t see through and super flattering for anyone with curves! I had just had a baby 6 months ago and wanted something flattering for my post baby bod on our trip to Hawaii. It is a little cheeky but nothing major or uncomfortable. Accentuates your curves and love the high waisted bottom to help hide tummy! Material is nice and buttery almost like an American eagle bathing suite! I am 5’4, About 140lbs, b cup and have a big booty ordered a medium and didn’t think this was too cheeky. The top i probably could of done a small and fit better but medium is ok. Love this suite ! Gives me confidence
customer_reviews.author: C-Berg

customer_reviews.title: Fits as it should, Highly recommend !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great bikini. The first one to fit me without having to order another (for the top) or having to mix match. I am 5’7 165 pounds and wear a size 36C it fits perfect. This bikini could fit many different body types. It is a great material and actually comes up high unlike some of the others I have ordered that say they’re high waisted but don’t come up high enough.
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy it
customer_reviews.text: Yall I lovvvvvveeeeeee thisssss . If I'm being honest tho I coudlve ordered an xl but Im not sure if it wouldve been too big or just right. The breast part was a little too small for me but doable. Im not exactly sure my bra size but it's for sure between 38c and 40d . But Its soooooo sexy . Now mind you I'm not the biggest fan of my thighs or butt hanging out. But it fit so perfectly I have no complaints . If you have bigger breast for sure size up if you're smaller in the legs I think it's pretty true to size tho . I'm 5'3 180lbs ordered a size large
customer_reviews.author: Ashana hilton

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute swimsuit! I bought it to wear during my 6th-7th month of pregnancy for the summer. I bought a LARGE and it’s still a little small. I am 5’5” and 152lbs right now and 6 months pregnant. I was hoping since I got a large that it would be a little bigger for these next few months but it’s still small. Looks cute for now though! But I normally wear a S/M pre pregnancy. So I’d size up. Still super cute! Can’t wait to wear it at the lake :)
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Joy Rice

customer_reviews.title: Quality material, beautiful colors, and fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like great quality. I was looking for high waisted bottoms that didn’t look like they were made for my grandmother and these are great! They are a little cheeky, but not too much where you can’t wear them around family. The top stays on even when I jumped up and down, which is rare for a tube top! The material is soft and seems like it is quality and durable. I would purchase again! For reference, I am 5’4, 118 lbs, with a D-DD bust and ordered a small.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Fashion rather than function
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9 and a muscular 165 with 34DD and while I love this suit and pattern, the bandeau top was the same width all the way around which meant the front was a little too slender to keep the girls totally covered while the back felt like it was way too covering. Yes the band fit me well and held things up but I wouldn’t trust this to actually swim in. Also keep in mind the top does not have a clasp so you have to stretch it over your head. Definitely fashion over function on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3.5/5 stars would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern of this suit and I love that it actually fits me! I usually need a medium or large top and extra large bottoms. I got a large in this suit. The bottoms are VERY cheeky and they ride up.. I’ve worn cheeky bottoms that stay in place a lot better than these. I am 5’9, 160-165 lbs, 35-28-42. I love the pattern and it wasn’t too expensive so I’m keeping it but I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nattie

customer_reviews.title: The fit is amazing!! True to size
customer_reviews.text: This is literally my favorite bikini purchase ever from amazon. The high waisted feature is nice and the fabric is very form fitting, but doesn’t cut in. I like that it is a little cheeky, but still looks classy. I’ve purchased in two different colors now, and looking into others.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer! Many compliments.
customer_reviews.text: This is the shit I have been wearing all summer. The only downfall is that you can’t order a different size top/bottom to be more compatible for your body. I’m usually a medium on top and large on bottom but I got a large so it wasn’t too tight on my booty. So having size options for both would be great as I find myself pulling up the top. This suit is great quality however and the thickness is nice. Very flattering as well.
customer_reviews.author: amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!! // Pros & Cons
customer_reviews.text: Measurements: 34" bust; 28" waist; 40" hips I got a medium in black, and it fit me just right! The pieces have elastic in them, so I struggled to put on the top and fully roll out the fabric for extra coverage. The material is very thick and comfortable to wear. I thought the bottoms would be more high waisted and cover more tummy, but I don't mind the cut as it makes me feel sexy when I put it on. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fabric but I wish I could buy each piece in different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 10", 125lbs. 34D. According to the size chart, I ordered a medium. The top fits great but the bottoms are pretty loose in the back. Slides around as I walk and creeps up. I ordered a small in another color and the bottoms are perfect but the top is too small. So I guess I have to buy 2 suits of each color (1 in a large and 1 in a medium) to get one that fits! But it's worth it. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, well made
customer_reviews.text: This is cuter than I expected! My only gripe is the top is a little large, while the bottoms fit true to size. I’m 5’8” 155lbs and ordered a large. I have a larger chest for my size, and the top is a little loose to be supportive. At the price point though, I will make it work. I’ve mixed and matched both pieces already this season, which is a huge plus for me as I spend most of the summer in a swim suit. I’ll probably end up buying a few more colors.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: I was super stoked about this swimsuit when I got it because it's affordable and it's cute! You can buy the same thing from a different brand and pay 4x as much. I did end up returning the suit though as the top was a bit big (I'm petite on the top and not on the bottom.:P) Ultimately I think the size could have been overlooked but I needed something that was going to stay on when I went swimming and bandeaus are no good for that.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: so I am 5'3 weigh 185lbs. My body type is Triangle or pear. This XL fit perfect. The waist is pretty high so make sure if you're self conscious about your bikini line to take care of that area because it's pretty high. The top it tight and a little struggle to get on but once it's on it feels comfortable and stays in place and doesn't cut into me like cookie dough haha I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Cute bathing suit.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bathing suit. I purchased the black and red in this bathing suit. I got the smallest size they offered either a extra small or small and I’m 5ft 3in around 110 pounds. The only issue I had with this swim suit is I felt that the bottoms were a little baggy in the butt area which kinda felt like I had a diaper on. I do have a smaller built with some what of a butt, but maybe just not big enough for this bathing suit.This would fit perfect on someone with a bigger butt.
customer_reviews.author: Djam28

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: I got size L, 5'8'', fluctuate between a 6 and n 8 (6 on a good day, 8 on a regular day). I'm a size bra 36B. The bikini fit very well, and I think I could have maybe gotten away with the medium too. I would size it's true to size based on other items of clothing I own that are size large. I LOVE that this covers the love handles. It's also not overly cheeky, which was my main concern. It's high waisted but still so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Ok I normally reaaly really hate bikinis. Im a mom of 2 and my body isnt what I would like it to be. That being said j lost some weight and wanted to give the bikini a whirl one more rime. I was realllyyyyyy impressed with this one: it fit perfectly (i ordered my normal medium that i would order in any clothing typically) and the fabric was good and heavy didnt feel flimsy/ the waist fit well and it was cheeky but not quite a thong. I will be ordering in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: EricaFeeStylist

customer_reviews.title: Great bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suit. Quality seems great, I have yet to wear it outside of trying it on when it came. I am usually a medium bottom and a small top, but after reading reviews I ordered a small. Fits perfectly, super cute and believe it or not the high waisted bottom is flattering. I would highly recommend this suit. I will be ordering another color! For reference: athletic build, 5'2 125lbs, 34A.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Size XL
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I’m chunky , about 225 , my measurements are 39”/37”/48” and it was snug, but I wanted that because I’ll be at the beach this month in August and the waves are always raging around this time. I wanted it to be snugger then the suits I wear in the pool. It’s very cheeky and that’s something that I was looking for. I’ll be posting pics on my Instagram if y’all would like to follow me I follow back. @imtherealmvp
customer_reviews.author: Carol Harstad

customer_reviews.title: Good but too cheeky for me
customer_reviews.text: It was really cute but too cheeky for me. So I’m returning it for that reason. Otherwise it’s a great bathing suit. I ordered up a size and it fit a little loose but not bad at all. For reference I’m 5’5” and 128 lbs. I’m usually a medium but I didn’t want it to fit tight on me, so I went with the large. For good but just way too cheeky. My big butt would end up swallowing all that up and then it would just be a thong!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Just A Bit Big
customer_reviews.text: The bikini is a great quality (pretty thick, elastic material) and looks fantastic on! The leopard print looks great! Plus, I love how it's lined and there's a light padding on the top so I don't have to worry about "nipping" (something that's super annoying and has in some of my more expensive suits like solid & striped). However, I'm a size 0 and the top ran a bit big for me (The small does say 2-4 which makes sense), and I'm afraid it might fall off if I get in the water. Overall I highly recommend it, and I think it's a fantastic suit at an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size Up- But Gives Great Confidence!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like high waisted bikinis because of a few reasons, but this is the perfect amount of high waist. It hits right below the belly button, so your entire belly button is seen but your stomach is still tucked in. I wanted a bathing suit I wouldn't have to worry about my appearance in while I was on spring break and this is it !!!! Although I sized up, it fit me PERFECTLY -make sure to read the size charts. I am 5'10, 170lbs, athletic build and I wore an XL which both the top and bottoms fit great for- I never had to pull the top up/ it never fell down. Get this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Pounch on you!
customer_reviews.text: This is as pictured. I think I opted for Size Med since my hips have spread a little within these past few months. I'm roughly 5' 7' maybe 130lbs.. _ I can't wait to wear it . *My only complaint is the sticker used in the crotch part left a sticky residue which I'll have to figure out how to remove Otherwise beautiful piece! Rarwwww
customer_reviews.author: hottmama

customer_reviews.title: The cutest suit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit! Very flattering for thicker girls. I never ventured into wearing “cheeky” bathing suits due to not having the confidence for them but this suit is amazing. The material is thick and good quality. I am 5’6 and around 200lbs and the Large fit me fine. My bra size is 38DD and the top is almost too small but I make it work. Overall very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide hips and loose skin
customer_reviews.text: I lost over 100 pounds so most bikinis create a loose-skin muffin top, even high waisted ones. The bottoms of this compress my lower abdomen enough to hide the excess skin I have but somehow miraculously doesn't create any overhang. My hips are wide and I'm not even an A cup, but both the top and bottom fit well (bought a medium). My measurements are 34-27-40 for reference. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. I’m a thicker girl and have a semi large bust, I usually don’t ever wear strapless items because I have to constantly adjust them. This bathing suit stays up well and holds its shape because it was small plastic boning on both side seams. I wish the padding inside the top was a bit firmer, I find it folds over inside the top and I have to fidget with it to smooth it out. Also, the bottoms are full coverage, I usually like my bottoms a little smaller so it doesn’t look too diapery. Otherwise, super cute and I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Order it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this suit!! I’m 5’3 165lbs I’m a triple d and wear a 8 in pants.. M in workout pants.. I have some curves and this suit is perfect for hiding what i want hid and showing what i like off :). Now the top is a little small ( i have implants so they don’t really push down) and my underboob hangs a bit so I’m gonna be ordering a XL for the top and L for the bottoms.. i will be ordering more of this suit in different colors. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: gene perz

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing for this brand
customer_reviews.text: Soooo upset the sizing for this brand isn't the same for each bathing suit. I ordered a different bathing suit, same brand, in a size large. Bottom fit me, too was a little too big (which I expected). So I ordered this one in a size large & the bottom is a little too tight & the top fits perfect. I would have given 5 stars if it wasn't for the sizing issue- quality of the bathing suit is really good for the price. I'm a 8/9 in pants & 36C for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE BIKINI!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this suit. Never expected amazon to give me a suit that finally met everything I was looking for. It’s super flattering and good quality material. Even though you have to buy the top and bottom the same size, it fits well. I got a L (fits like 6-8) and I normally wear more of 8-10 but it fits perfectly. I will definitely be buying another color!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cheeky bottom runs big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mostly for the top as I knew the bottoms might be a bit too cheeky for me. Weirdly, I like the bottoms, though they are slightly baggy and DO wedge. I feel like they run large while the top runs small. I’m 5’3, 130# and ordered a medium. I bought the white/green suit and the all black so that I can mix the tops with my other bottoms. Will probably wear the bottoms in my backyard but I wish they had more elastic to keep them in position. Too is cute and comfy with removable padding.
customer_reviews.author: marci

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional fit and quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying a bathing suit online but after seeing all the positive reviews I went for it and they were all right!!! This bikini is so flattering and seems like good quality for the price. I ordered a size small and it fit absolutely perfect. I did not size up so I’d say it’s true to size. If you have large boobs then I would not recommend this bikini for you the top is definitely meant for ppl with smaller chests. I will be purchasing more from this brand forsure!!! -5’4” -115 lbs - slim athletic build
customer_reviews.author: Dancer5678

customer_reviews.title: I love this suit
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit!! I was looking for something that was highwaisted but wasn’t too skimpy and this is perfect. I’m 5’3 135 pounds and a 34C and the Medium fits perfectly! Not too tight and not too loose and the white makes my tan pop. I gave it four stars because the padding inside the top moves around and you can sort of see them through the material. Other than that I love it definitely worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katia Otano

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered a size large based on the reviews and found that I probably could have sized down. The top is a little loose which isn’t great since it’s a bandeau and the bottoms seem to have a lot of extra material making it look like I have a wedge-y when I don’t. I’ve worn it once and it’s not thin, actually had a really nice thickness to it. It’s not high rise, it’s high cut on the sides and almost mid rise in the front with a cheeky back. It would be really cute I think if it fit me properly.
customer_reviews.author: equusamber

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this suit! I got an XL and expected the top to be huge but fit perfect. I would definitely size up. Good material for the price and flattering
customer_reviews.author: Miquela Sauerzopf Ciccarelli

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute swimsuit and good quality. If you have large boobs the top probably will not fit. Im a 32C and its pretty snug. The bityoms have a little bit of sagging. I would say its because they are too big, as quite a bit on my cheeks are showing lol. Its just the cut of the fabric. Its not that bad though. Shows a good amount of booty! Cant wait to wear it to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Baggy bottoms
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this suit for thinner women. I knew this suit might be a bit too big but it’s nearly impossible to find high waisted bottoms in my size. My measurements are 28-24-31 and I weigh 96 lbs-I typically wear a 32 DD. The small top did not fit well over breast implants but seemed to fit around my body nicely. The bottoms, however, were WAY too big. Surprisingly, they did fit me around the waist but got extremely baggy around the crotch/butt. It would be perfect for women with a thin waist and bigger bottom. I wanted to love this suit but it has to be returned and I will continue my search for some XS bottoms!
customer_reviews.author: AbbeyGK

customer_reviews.title: It didn't fit me like I thought
customer_reviews.text: It didn't fit me like I thought. I am 5'3, 127 lbs., 34B. The top fit well (not tight-- so there is room for someone bustier). The bottoms, however, were too high up-- the length from waist to crotch was too long for me. However, it fit my daughter-in-law-- and she really likes it. She's just under 5', about 135 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: I A

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISING
customer_reviews.text: So I’m 5’5 and weight like 145-150 lbs I have a semi athletic body. So it’s like a mix of a mom body and athletic body. I lack in having boobs but definitely have a semi big butt so I went with the mediums. I was nervous because when you order online you never know if it will but ugly or not fit but I was shocked that it fit perfectly, is made of a thick material, is cute, and looks exactly like the picture I would definitely recommend this bikini! I might even buy the same one in a different color it is so cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D DiVittorio

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Color is a bit different.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s my second one. The first one I got was white leopard patterned. I’m contemplating to come back and buy another color. If you’re hesitating go for it! It’s worth the money. This bikini really accentuates your assets. I’m a 5’2, 135 lbs, 34C/36B chest, 27-28 jeans size with a butt and the bikini is perfect on me. If you have smaller chest the top might be tricky to fit. The color is more like a mango yellow so it’s more rich and not as bright but it works on my skin tone (medium color with yellow undertone) so I’m okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite suit
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I am 5'5, 183 lbs. I ordered an XL because I know these usually run small. It does for sure, I am a size 10-12 pants and usually wear a large. I felt amazing! It is soft and comfortable and didn't fall off in the rough surf!
customer_reviews.author: Gabbilina

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. Not good or great
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’7 and weigh 144. I’d say the medium is a smaller medium.. I get a medium in everything even name brand clothes and sometimes it’s even big on me. The bathing suit is not bad per say, but it doesn’t fit great either. I think if you’re young with no kids maybe this will fit great. But for a true medium mom—i think this fits kinda on the tighter side. still wearable. Still trendy. It was cheap, so if you’re in a rush I’d still say go for it. Maybe just know a bit of your mommy love handle will peek out but screw it lol
customer_reviews.author: Tina1234

customer_reviews.title: i dig it.
customer_reviews.text: i'm 5'2", 120lbs. ordered the pink snakeskin print in size medium. it fits me perfectly. love the high waist. looks super good on my tan skin. although the top is a little snug, i kind of prefer it that way. i feel secure & feel confident that i'm not gonna accidentally slip a tit. if you're small but have pretty decent boobies i'd suggest a size up on the top or you might feel squished. i give it 5 stars because i'd definitely consider buying another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Freed

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Price!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9", 34B, size s/m, 27" bottoms and I bought this suit in a medium. I LOVE it! It's super flattering on. The bottoms are the best, good coverage-not cheeky, but not diaper-like either. These bottoms are mid rise that can be worn lower or higher if that makes sense. I also love the top. I don't think this top would be great for ladies with a cup size bigger than a C though. Great value for what I paid, this suit will be a go-to and I've already got it coming in another color!
customer_reviews.author: doylemd

customer_reviews.title: Soooo cute, but had to return
customer_reviews.text: This bikini is super cute and very well made. I just wish you had the option to choose one size for the top and one size for the bottom. The top was too small (total underboob!) while the bottoms fit perfectly. So sad it didn’t workout, but this is pretty normal for me I’m larger in the chest smaller in the booty... wonk wonk! For reference: 5’5” 119lbs 34D Size 2-4 pants I ordered a small
customer_reviews.author: sass"i"

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Read a ton of reviews before I purchased this suit. I’m 5’3 about 135lbs. Usually do small tops with med or large bottoms. So I was worried with purchasing a set all the same size. Everyone said the bottoms fit them a little big so I decided to go with the small and I’m in love with how this suit fits. Probably going to order another color to mix and match.
customer_reviews.author: cbsundman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfy, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bathing suit so much, and it is so comfortable and beautiful! I will be purchasing again! I’m 5’4” and 145, and the large fit great. Be aware, though, that the top has very little stretch. If I were any bigger than a 36C, I think it would be hard getting the top on and off. However, the top does not slide down, roll, or fall off because it has high quality structured seams on the side so I love it. Also, make sure you have a good bikini wax because the crotch of the bottoms is a little high and thin, but 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shea Swikard

customer_reviews.title: Good Material, but is it still made well?
customer_reviews.text: The swimsuit fits great, but my top was VERY UNCOMFORTABLE. I like to think this was just one top messed up during manufacturing because the black marble one I received does not do this. The wires on either side of this blue top that go up and down were poking me the entire time I wore this swimsuit. Very frustrating. Hoping I can get in contact with them and ask for a replacement top. Other than that, great swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: eugene

customer_reviews.title: Fits curvy girls too!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is perfect. Great quality and material for the price. I am 5'1 147Ibs I wear a 36C curvy build and a large fits beautifuly. It is very cheeky and high waisted. The back of the bottoms is higher than the front. The back goes halfway up my back while the front goes up to my waste so that looks a bit funny but i still over all like this bikini. I really wish i would have taken the chance and bought this suit at the beginning of summer. Will be ordering more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Suit
customer_reviews.text: The suit arrived on time, exactly as described. Very cute!! Fits nicely. The thing that kept me from rating 5 stars is, my daughter wore a white t-shirt over it after getting out of the pool. The pink faded all over the shirt and completely ruined it. If you buy it, be sure to wash it first, with nothing else in the wash. I would have washed it first anyway, but she was leaving for her beach trip and we were literally waiting at the mailbox for it to come so she could take it with her.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Super cute suit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teen daughter and she is PICKY! This suit fit her like it was custom made - it's cute with great coverage without being too "cheeky". We bought another one in the leopard print and her girlfriends have bought the same suit in different colors. Great buy, great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Cruz

customer_reviews.title: BUY MULTIPLE ... NOW!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re trying to look your absolute best poolside or at the beach BUY THIS NOW! It’s very flattering, great support for a strapless top (I usually wouldn’t buy strapless because I felt like I’d look saggy), it feels like butter on the skin, the color is vibrant. I actually think this is will look good on every body type. I’m actually debating on buying two more! For size reference - I’m 5’2” 150 lbs bought a medium and it’s a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirl_LC

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on the hunt for a strapless bikini top that actually stays put and this one does for the most part. Obviously if you are jumping/running around you will need to continue to adjust it. I don’t care for the bottoms because I don’t like showing too much of my butt in bikini’s so I usually wear shorts or different bottoms. The color is gorgeous! It hasn’t faded or anything. I’ve worn it and washed it probably 10 times already.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Its average
customer_reviews.text: I would say this is an ok swim suit the 1 thing I would change is the wiring in the top piece it was like digging into my skin and I got a large and I'm a 36C 5'4. It fits fine especially the bottoms its just the wires hurt. Also I suggest getting a plain color. I went with the black marble and it almost looks blurry if that makes sense. Anyways I won't be returning it and maybe when I lose weight it will fit better lol but it's just an ok swimsuit for now
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Daniels

customer_reviews.title: order up a size
customer_reviews.text: I still gave this suit a 4 star because I really do love the suit, im usually a medium and the large is what actually fits me, I do have a long torso, so that could have something to do with it but aside from sizing the suit is great, I just had a baby 5 months ago and this suit it perfect for covering up what I need! I ordered the cheetah in a size medium, and im returning it for a large bc its super cute as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Lauren

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 buy it
customer_reviews.text: I literally never make reviews but honestly this was one of the best purchases I’ve ever made on amazon. I am 5’11” 180. Definitely curvy. Typically a 10/12 us., 34dd bra. I ordered the xl and it is perfect. Very thick matieral to hold everything in. Covers the goods yet still sexy.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheeky but covers the right places!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design on the bottoms of this swimsuit! It’s very cute & comfy. However, because I’m petite the bottoms from the back were a little loose, maybe if you have a fuller booty it will look nice. I still wore it to the beach anyway! For reference, I’m 34c in bras, I’m 5ft & I usually wear small/medium but I got a small & it fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Maria A Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! Bathing suits are always tricky for me to buy without trying on first since I am bigger on top and smaller on the bottom. I’m 5’6, 34DD, 160 lbs. I got an XL because these bathing suits always tend to run small plus my boobs are always an issue. This bathing suits fits perfect and the bottoms are very flattering and the top hugs my boobs perfectly! No under boob falling out! For the price this bathing suit is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Pisarski

customer_reviews.title: Best bikini I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to but this because I have been struggling to find a bikini that looks good on my short athletic build. JUST GET IT LADIES!! It feels very high quality, fits true to size. I am 4’11”, 120lb- very small chest but large legs and butt, I ordered a small. It is so flattering, I want more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbie Frantz

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS LIKE THE PHOTOS
customer_reviews.text: My bathing suit came almost a whole week earlier than expected! And it’s soo cute, it looks like the photos. I’m 5’3” and I’m usually a size 6 and I normally wear 34/36D bras. I ordered a medium. I wish I could of ordered a medium for the bottom and a large for the top. I feel like it’s a little too small on top. It’s not too tight or anything like that,but I wish it would cover a little more on top. But that’s just my personally preference some people might prefer that. But other than that this is a great bathing suit!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this bathing suit. Even though it was pretty good quality (complete with cups and structured wire on the side), I’m still a little iffy about the price point for a few reasons. One is that if you wanted to remove the cups you can’t really because you’ll see nipple. Another is that it was okay on top and at the waist but it was baggy at the butt. I shrunk it a little in the dryer but it was still annoying.
customer_reviews.author: avid amazoner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this suit.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this suit, considering it was from amazon. Showed my bum just a little like I wanted. Top fit me well. I am a 34C at Victoria Secret. And other bras I wear a 34B. So weird, I know. But giving reference to ladies. I normally wear medium in my bottoms for underwear. So a medium set fit me well overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Staub

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the red suit in Medium. I was hoping for a deep sultry red but it’s more candy cherry red.... Definitely not the correct tone red for my lighter skin. I’ll be returning for a different color because I do actually like the style of the suit. I’m 5’6, an athletic 160 with hips and a bigger butt. Wear size 6 jeans. I bought a medium. The top fit great but the bottom were slightly too tight just on the hips they created a muffin top effect. So I’ll have to buy a medium for just the top and a large just for the bottoms. Great suit though especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon stays winning
customer_reviews.text: Shut the front door. I still can’t believe I got this suit off of Amazon. The quality is surprisingly really great, it Hugs my body so well. I’m 5’2 ~155 with an athletic build– I usually get M or L, I got a Large in this suit. The bottoms fit like a gem, I wish the top was little tighter, I probably could’ve sized down to a medium but I needed the suit before a trip to Vegas. I will definitely purchase another color in the future. For the price, you can’t beat the quality. I have suits that I’ve paid 2x the cost of this set that are 1/2 the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and flattering!
customer_reviews.text: For reference, I am 5'7" 36G 150 pounds. I bought this suit in size medium, based on other reviews. The bottoms fit, but the top doesn't cover enough, with a little bit of fallout. I really only wanted the bottoms anyway, so that's fine. This is a surprisingly high quality suit for the price, and I will order another in large. The cut of the bottoms is very flattering after I put on a few pounds during the pandemic. 07/10/2020 Edit: I ordered the suit in size large, and it fits perfectly! I absolutely LOVE this suit! Very comfortable and well made, and it looks great, too! Hubby approves.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Buy this!!! I’m 5’9 155 lbs 34D and the medium is perfect. The bottoms make your butt look amazing and the bandeau is slightly padded and gives your boobs some oomph, if u know what I mean ;) no muffin top and hits right below my belly button, but I’m tall so it might go higher on some
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

product_meta.title: OMKAGI Women's 2 Pieces Bandeau Bikini Swimsuits Off Shoulder High Waist Bathing Suit High Cut
feature_bullets: Style: Strapless bikini top off-shoulder, High waisted bikini bottom with high cut
Chest Pad: Removable padding bra, women cute bikinis
Perfect for SPA, swimming parties, tropical vacations, summer, beach & pool
Size: S(US 2-4)/M(US 4-6)/L(US 6-8); Cleaning: Hand Wash Cold/Flat Dry
